org.apache.flink.util

类 StringUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.util.StringUtils

  • @PublicEvolving
public final class StringUtils
extends Object
    Utility class to convert objects into strings in vice-versa.

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static String arrayAwareToString(Object o)
      This method calls Object.toString() on the given object, unless the object is an array.
      static String arrayToString(Object array)
      Returns a string representation of the given array.
      static String byteToHexString(byte[] bytes)
      Given an array of bytes it will convert the bytes to a hex string representation of the bytes.
      static String byteToHexString(byte[] bytes, int start, int end)
      Given an array of bytes it will convert the bytes to a hex string representation of the bytes.
      static String escapeHtml(String str)
      Helper function to escape Strings for display in HTML pages.

      Creates a random string with a length within the given interval.
      static String getRandomString(Random rnd, int minLength, int maxLength, char minValue, char maxValue)
      Creates a random string with a length within the given interval.

      Given a hex string this will return the byte array corresponding to the string .

      Reads a String from the given input.

      Makes a string representation of the exception.

      Writes a String to the given output.

    • 方法详细资料

      • stringifyException

        public static String stringifyException(Throwable e)
        Makes a string representation of the exception.
        参数:
        e - the exception to stringify
        返回:
        A string with exception name and call stack.

      • byteToHexString

        public static String byteToHexString(byte[] bytes,
                                     int start,
                                     int end)
        Given an array of bytes it will convert the bytes to a hex string representation of the bytes.
        参数:
        bytes - the bytes to convert in a hex string
        start - start index, inclusively
        end - end index, exclusively
        返回:
        hex string representation of the byte array
        另请参阅:
        org.apache.commons.codec.binary.Hex#encodeHexString(byte[])

      • byteToHexString

        public static String byteToHexString(byte[] bytes)
        Given an array of bytes it will convert the bytes to a hex string representation of the bytes.
        参数:
        bytes - the bytes to convert in a hex string
        返回:
        hex string representation of the byte array

      • hexStringToByte

        public static byte[] hexStringToByte(String hex)
        Given a hex string this will return the byte array corresponding to the string .
        参数:
        hex - the hex String array
        返回:
        a byte array that is a hex string representation of the given string. The size of the byte array is therefore hex.length/2

      • escapeHtml

        public static String escapeHtml(String str)
        Helper function to escape Strings for display in HTML pages. The function replaces certain characters by their HTML coded correspondent.
        参数:
        str - The string to escape.
        返回:
        The escaped string.

      • arrayAwareToString

        public static String arrayAwareToString(Object o)
        This method calls Object.toString() on the given object, unless the object is an array. In that case, it will use the arrayToString(Object) method to create a string representation of the array that includes all contained elements.
        参数:
        o - The object for which to create the string representation.
        返回:
        The string representation of the object.

      • arrayToString

        public static String arrayToString(Object array)
        Returns a string representation of the given array. This method takes an Object to allow also all types of primitive type arrays.
        参数:
        array - The array to create a string representation for.
        返回:
        The string representation of the array.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the given object is no array.

      • showControlCharacters

        public static String showControlCharacters(String str)
        Replaces control characters by their escape-coded version. For example, if the string contains a line break character ('\n'), this character will be replaced by the two characters backslash '\' and 'n'. As a consequence, the resulting string will not contain any more control characters.
        参数:
        str - The string in which to replace the control characters.
        返回:
        The string with the replaced characters.

      • getRandomString

        public static String getRandomString(Random rnd,
                                     int minLength,
                                     int maxLength)
        Creates a random string with a length within the given interval. The string contains only characters that can be represented as a single code point.
        参数:
        rnd - The random used to create the strings.
        minLength - The minimum string length.
        maxLength - The maximum string length (inclusive).
        返回:
        A random String.

      • getRandomString

        public static String getRandomString(Random rnd,
                                     int minLength,
                                     int maxLength,
                                     char minValue,
                                     char maxValue)
        Creates a random string with a length within the given interval. The string contains only characters that can be represented as a single code point.
        参数:
        rnd - The random used to create the strings.
        minLength - The minimum string length.
        maxLength - The maximum string length (inclusive).
        minValue - The minimum character value to occur.
        maxValue - The maximum character value to occur.
        返回:
        A random String.

      • writeNullableString

        public static void writeNullableString(String str,
                                       DataOutputView out)
                                throws IOException
        Writes a String to the given output. The string may be null. The written string can be read with readNullableString(DataInputView)-
        参数:
        str - The string to write, or null.
        out - The output to write to.
        抛出:
        IOException - Throws if the writing or the serialization fails.

      • readNullableString

        public static String readNullableString(DataInputView in)
                                 throws IOException
        Reads a String from the given input. The string may be null and must have been written with writeNullableString(String, DataOutputView).
        参数:
        in - The input to read from.
        返回:
        The deserialized string, or null.
        抛出:
        IOException - Throws if the reading or the deserialization fails.
